item.title: About Me
item.description: Discover the story behind MechCarbide.com, why Alex Carter started this website to share information of carbide tool and wear part suppliers in various industries.

item.title: Acreage Tools LLC
item.description: Acreage Tools LLC supplies heavy-duty aftermarket mulcher teeth for Seppi, Prinoth, Loftness, Quadco, and CAT equipment, designed for durability and reliable field performance.

item.title: Basic Carbide, Corp.
item.description: Basic Carbide is a premier USA manufacturer of tungsten carbide preforms, seal rings & wear parts. Features a dedicated Nickel-binder plant & massive in-house CNC grinding capabilities serving 50+ countries.

item.title: BETEK GmbH & Co. KG
item.description: Global expert in tungsten carbide technology, BETEK designs and manufactures premium wear parts and tooling systems for demanding industries.

item.title: Border City Tools
item.description: Border City Tools offers carbide stump grinder teeth, construction bits, and mining drill bits compatible with major equipment brands. Founded in 1954 in the U.S.

item.title: CEI Supply
item.description: CEI Supply, established in 1978, provides stump grinder teeth, pockets, wheels, upgrade kits, brush chipper knives, and tree cutting accessories from top brands and its own CEI line.

item.title: CERATIZIT S.A.
item.description: Discover CERATIZIT - The global tungsten carbide authority since 1929. Source premium rods, blanks, and wear parts backed by full-cycle sustainable recycling and extreme manufacturing capabilities.

item.title: Denis Cimaf, Inc
item.description: Denis Cimaf designs and manufactures high-quality mulching attachments and replacement teeth for skid steers and excavators, offering reliable performance and expert service worldwide.

item.title: Diamond Mowers, LLC
item.description: Diamond Mowers designs and manufactures mowing, mulching, and brush cutting attachments and replacement parts. Offers 2-year warranty, 30-day return policy, and U.S. online parts store.

item.title: DIENES Werke GmbH & Co. KG
item.description: DIENES Group is a global leader in industrial slitting technology since 1913. Specializing in pneumatic knife holders, automatic slitting systems, and machine retrofits.

item.title: EXTRAMET Products, LLC
item.description: EXTRAMET Products, LLC is a premier source for precision Tungsten Carbide Rods & Step Blanks. Combining Swiss quality with USA manufacturing (Latrobe, PA). Expert Centerless & CNC Grinding services.

item.title: FAE S.p.A.
item.description: FAE, founded in Italy, designs and manufactures forestry mulchers, tillers, stump cutters, road planers, and demining machines.

item.title: FECON
item.description: Fecon designs and manufactures durable mulching heads, forestry attachments, and tractors. Offers Fusion smart control, online parts store, 30-day returns, and secure payment options.

item.title: Federal Carbide Company
item.description: Federal Carbide is a fully integrated USA manufacturer of Tungsten Carbide & Heavy Alloys. Featuring 750-ton presses for large near-net shapes and Sinter-HIP technology. Min order $500.

item.title: Fuji Die Co., Ltd.
item.description: Fuji Die (FUJILLOY) is Japan's premier manufacturer of wear-resistant carbide tools & molds. Specializing in EV motor lamination dies (VG48) and nano-grade precision.

item.title: Green Manufacturing, Inc.
item.description: Green Manufacturing offers carbide-tipped Greenteeth® stump grinder teeth, pockets, cutting wheels, and upgrade kits. Made in the USA with a focus on innovation and durability.

item.title: Gyro-Trac
item.description: Gyro-Trac is a US-based manufacturer and supplier of mulchers, mulching heads, and mulcher teeth.

item.title: Hendrix Timber Mulchers
item.description: Hendrix Timber Mulchers supplies new and used forestry and timber mulching equipment and replacement parts, serving East Texas and the U.S. since 1980.

item.title: Hyperion Materials & Technologies
item.description: Born from GE & Sandvik, Hyperion is a global leader in Tungsten Carbide & Synthetic Diamond. Specializing in Can Tooling, Rotary Cutting, and revolutionary Carbide 3D Printing.

item.title: Impact Supply Co.
item.description: Impact Supply Company provides aftermarket forestry mulcher teeth compatible with equipment from brands such as FAE, CAT, Denis Cimaf, Shearex, Fecon, and Bobcat.

item.title: ISCAR LTD.
item.description: ISCAR is a Berkshire Hathaway company & global leader in metalworking innovation. Home of MULTI-MASTER, CHAMDRILL, and 'High IQ' tooling solutions for zero setup time.

item.title: KingKong-Tools GmbH & Co. KG
item.description: KingKong-Tools is a German manufacturer of tungsten carbide tools and wear parts for recycling, forestry, construction, and agriculture.

item.title: Leitz GmbH & Co. KG
item.description: Leitz is the world market leader in precision woodworking tools since 1876. From WhisperCut sawblades to global Tool Management & Resharpening services, Leitz define the industry standard.

item.title: Leonardi Mfg Co., Inc.
item.description: Leonardi Manufacturing produces American-made stump grinder teeth, cutting wheels, wood chipper blades, and tree rigging equipment, delivering reliable solutions for arborists worldwide.

item.title: LEUCO Ledermann GmbH & Co. KG
item.description: LEUCO is the German innovator behind the patented p-System 'peeling' technology. Direct source for premium carbide and diamond woodworking tools, low-noise saw blades, and global tool management services.

item.title: Loftness Manufacturing
item.description: Loftness® is a US-based supplier of vegetation management and agricultural equipment, parts and accessories.

item.title: Morbark, LLC
item.description: Morbark, LLC manufactures innovative forestry, biomass, and recycling equipment that converts wood and organic waste into valuable products.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
At MechCarbide, accessible from MechCarbide.com, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by MechCarbide and how we use it.

If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in MechCarbide. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.

item.title: Quadco Inc.
item.description: Quadco is a Canadian manufacturer of forestry cutting systems and attachments, offering patented cutting tools, teeth and chain sharpeners through global OEM and distributor networks.

item.title: Rayco Manufacturing, Inc
item.description: Rayco manufactures innovative stump cutters, forestry mulchers, wheel loaders, and replacement teeth for professional tree care and vegetation management worldwide.

item.title: Sanalloy Industry Co.,Ltd.
item.description: Sanalloy Industry is the Japanese expert in 'problem-solving' carbide. Specializing in Low-Friction (P-Series) & Anti-Corrosion (MBN) grades for EV and precision stamping dies.

item.title: Sandvik Coromant
item.description: Sandvik Coromant is the world leader in metal cutting tools since 1942. Home of PrimeTurning™ & Coromant Capto®. Explore 50,000+ premium inserts, digital machining solutions, and sustainable carbide recycling services.

item.title: Shandong Techgong Geotechnical Engineering Equipment Co., Ltd
item.description: As an outstanding manufacturer in China, Shandong Techgong supplies reliable carbide cutting products and solutions to clients worldwide in the construction and mining industries.

item.title: SLB
item.description: SLB (formerly Schlumberger) is the global leader in energy innovation. Home of Smith Bits, advanced PDC cutters, and industry-leading tungsten carbide drilling technologies.

item.title: TIGRA GmbH
item.description: Explore TIGRA GmbH - The global gold standard for woodworking carbide & metalworking blanks. Discover their premium German-made saw tips, reversible knives, and proprietary in-house production capabilities.

item.title: TKM Group
item.description: TKM Group (The Knife Manufacturers) is the global leader in industrial slitting knives since 1908. Featuring ±0.0005mm precision, CASKA setup software, and circular saw blades for paper & metal.

item.title: Total Carbide Ltd.
item.description: Total Carbide is the UK's largest independent manufacturer of sintered tungsten carbide. Home of the Intraform™ process for complex Oil & Gas valves. Bespoke design & large-scale production.

item.title: Vermeer Corporation
item.description: Vermeer is a global manufacturer of industrial and agricultural equipment, offering machinery for agriculture, environmental work, infrastructure and more through a 600-location dealer network.

item.title: Werewolf Parts, LLC
item.description: Discover Werewolf Parts, a North American supplier of aftermarket mulching teeth and stump grinding teeth. Includes ordering, shipping, and return policy details.

item.title: XTREME TEETH
item.description: XTREME TEETH, also known as ASTRAK CANADA LTD, provides aftermarket forestry mulcher teeth for 100+ brands, with fast shipping across the USA and Canada.
